definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: For flat glass, heat tempering is most often used.
sentences.chinese: 對於平板玻璃，熱退火是最常用的。

sentences.english: Mother often makes dumpling filling with cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽常用捲心菜做餃子餡。

sentences.english: The most commonly used form of radar energy return mapping is the Base Reflectivity graph.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的雷達能量回程測繪形式是基本反射率圖。

sentences.english: Swelling the fundamental law is one common kind of pressure processes in restoring parts.
sentences.chinese: 脹大法是壓力加工修復常用的一種方法。

sentences.english: Quite a number of imprecise words are used in our everyday speech.
sentences.chinese: 我們的日常用語中有相當一部分是不確定詞。

sentences.english: To learn to type, seldom at ordinary times used phoneticize also was collected rise.
sentences.chinese: 爲了學打字，平時不常用的拼音也撿了起來。

sentences.english: All sorts of commonly-used technologies for controlling Cr-containing wastewater are presented .
sentences.chinese: 介紹目前比較常用的含鉻廢水的種種治理技術。

sentences.english: Ear swelling model is commonly used in the study of anti inflammation assay.
sentences.chinese: 鼠耳腫脹法是常用的抗炎藥的篩選實驗方法。

sentences.english: The Transfer Matrix Method (TMM) and the Finite Element Method (FEM) are two ordinary calculating methods for rotary system.
sentences.chinese: 傳遞矩陣法和有限元法是轉子動力學分析的常用方法。

sentences.english: Erythromycin and tylosin were widely used in veterinary.
sentences.chinese: 獸醫臨牀最常用的是紅黴素和泰樂菌素。

sentences.english: This is a common strategy among pros who have a lot of experience and iron discipline.
sentences.chinese: 這是有經驗，有鐵的紀律的專業人士常用的策略。

sentences.english: The duality method is used usually in the study of the optimal problem.
sentences.chinese: 如所周知，研究此類差異問題常用的方法是對偶方法。

sentences.english: The most commonly used patterns are highlighted in bold.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的模式用黑體突出顯示。

sentences.english: Pre-compression is the most common method for treating soft soil foundation.
sentences.chinese: 預壓是最常用的軟土地基處治方法。

sentences.english: The common driers are metal octoate and metal naphthenate.
sentences.chinese: 常用的是變價金屬環烷酸鹽和異辛酸鹽。

sentences.english: Curing parents by cutting thigh is the common topic to promote filial piety in the dramas of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 割股療親是明清戲曲宣傳孝道的常用題材。

definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to use for the purpose of/to serve as
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc)/to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc)/(of two or more things) interchangeable
